definition: A term commonly used to describe a type of employment or work arrangement where an individual dedicates their entire working hours to a particular job or occupation. It typically refers to a full-time position, indicating that the person is employed for the standard or customary number of hours per week in a specific industry or country.

examples.english: She is looking for a full-time job.

examples.german: Vollzeitbeschäftigung ist in dieser Branche üblich.
examples.english: Full-time employment is common in this industry.

examples.german: Die meisten Angestellten arbeiten in Vollzeit.
